mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BILL_FAV WHERE BILL_ID = #{bill_id} AND MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} AND BILL_FAV_CHECK = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT B.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM BILL_FAV WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} AND BILL_FAV_CHECK = 'Y' ORDER BY BILL_FAV_SEQ DESC)B)A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) JOIN BILL USING (BILL_ID) ORDER BY BILL_FAV_SEQ DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BILL_FAV JOIN BILL USING(BILL_ID) WHERE BILL_FAV.MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} AND BILL_FAV_CHECK = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM BILL JOIN BILL_FAV USING(BILL_ID) WHERE BILL.MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} AND BILL_FAV_CHECK = 'Y' ORDER BY BILL_FAV.BOARD_FAV_SEQ DESC

SELECT * FROM BILL JOIN BILL_FAV USING(BILL_ID) WHERE BILL_FAV.MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} AND BILL_FAV.BILL_FAV_CHECK = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(BILL_FAV.BILL_FAV_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') > (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-2, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) ORDER BY BILL_FAV.BILL_FAV_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BILL_FAV VALUES(#{member_seq}, #{bill_id}, BILL_FAV_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'Y', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE BILL_FAV SET BILL_FAV_CHECK = 'N' WHERE BILL_ID = #{bill_id} AND MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq}
